event.description: Jean Segura singles on a line drive to center fielder Jake Marisnick.
Mitch Haniger walks. Jean Segura to 2nd.
Robinson Cano grounds into a double play, first baseman Yuli Gurriel to shortstop Carlos Correa to pitcher Joe Musgrove. Jean Segura to 3rd. Mitch Haniger out at 2nd.
Nelson Cruz grounds out, pitcher Joe Musgrove to first baseman Yuli Gurriel.
Kyle Seager singles on a ground ball to center fielder Jake Marisnick.
Danny Valencia strikes out swinging.
Carlos Ruiz flies out to right fielder George Springer.
Astros challenged (play at 1st), call on the field was overturned: Jarrod Dyson grounds out softly, first baseman Yuli Gurriel to pitcher Joe Musgrove.
Leonys Martin grounds out, third baseman Marwin Gonzalez to first baseman Yuli Gurriel.
Jean Segura grounds out, shortstop Carlos Correa to first baseman Yuli Gurriel.
Mitch Haniger homers (1) on a fly ball to left center field.
Robinson Cano flies out to center fielder Jake Marisnick.
Nelson Cruz called out on strikes.
Kyle Seager flies out to left fielder Norichika Aoki.
Danny Valencia grounds out, pitcher Joe Musgrove to first baseman Yuli Gurriel.
Carlos Ruiz walks.
Jarrod Dyson lines out to center fielder Jake Marisnick.
Leonys Martin pops out to shortstop Carlos Correa.
Jean Segura flies out to right fielder George Springer in foul territory.
Mitch Haniger singles on a sharp line drive to left fielder Norichika Aoki.
Robinson Cano singles on a sharp line drive to right fielder George Springer. Mitch Haniger to 2nd.
Nelson Cruz walks. Mitch Haniger to 3rd. Robinson Cano to 2nd.
Pitching Change: Michael Feliz replaces Joe Musgrove.
Kyle Seager grounds into a force out, first baseman Yuli Gurriel to shortstop Carlos Correa. Mitch Haniger scores. Robinson Cano to 3rd. Nelson Cruz out at 2nd. Kyle Seager to 1st.
Danny Valencia lines out to second baseman Jose Altuve.
Carlos Ruiz flies out to center fielder Jake Marisnick.
Jarrod Dyson lines out to second baseman Jose Altuve.
Leonys Martin strikes out swinging.
Jean Segura grounds out, shortstop Carlos Correa to first baseman Yuli Gurriel.
Pitching Change: Luke Gregerson replaces Michael Feliz.
Mitch Haniger strikes out swinging.
Robinson Cano lines out sharply to center fielder Jake Marisnick.
Nelson Cruz strikes out swinging.
Alex Bregman remains in the game as the designated hitter.
Pitching Change: Ken Giles replaces Luke Gregerson.
Kyle Seager called out on strikes.
Danny Valencia walks.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-runner Taylor Motter replaces Danny Valencia.
Carlos Ruiz hit by pitch. Taylor Motter to 2nd.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-runner Guillermo Heredia replaces Carlos Ruiz.
Jarrod Dyson singles on a line drive to center fielder Jake Marisnick. Taylor Motter scores. Guillermo Heredia to 2nd.
Leonys Martin strikes out swinging.
Jean Segura singles on a sharp ground ball to right fielder George Springer. Guillermo Heredia scores. Jarrod Dyson to 3rd.
With Mitch Haniger batting, Jean Segura steals (1) 2nd base.
Mitch Haniger called out on strikes.
George Springer homers (3) on a fly ball to left center field.
Marwin Gonzalez strikes out swinging.
Jose Altuve singles on a ground ball to first baseman Danny Valencia.
Carlos Correa lines out sharply to center fielder Leonys Martin.
Carlos Beltran pops out to second baseman Robinson Cano.
Yuli Gurriel grounds out, shortstop Jean Segura to first baseman Danny Valencia.
Brian McCann singles on a ground ball to center fielder Leonys Martin.
Jake Marisnick flies out to right fielder Mitch Haniger.
Norichika Aoki walks. Brian McCann to 2nd.
George Springer pops out to second baseman Robinson Cano.
Marwin Gonzalez homers (2) on a fly ball to left field.
Jose Altuve strikes out swinging.
Carlos Correa grounds out, second baseman Robinson Cano to first baseman Danny Valencia.
Carlos Beltran strikes out swinging.
Yuli Gurriel flies out to right fielder Mitch Haniger.
Brian McCann flies out to right fielder Mitch Haniger.
Jake Marisnick strikes out swinging.
Norichika Aoki singles on a ground ball to left fielder Jarrod Dyson.
George Springer walks. Norichika Aoki to 2nd.
Marwin Gonzalez hit by pitch. Norichika Aoki to 3rd. George Springer to 2nd.
Jose Altuve grounds into a double play, third baseman Kyle Seager to catcher Carlos Ruiz to first baseman Danny Valencia. Norichika Aoki out at home. George Springer to 3rd. Marwin Gonzalez to 2nd.
Ariel Miranda intentionally walks Carlos Correa.
Carlos Beltran lines out to second baseman Robinson Cano.
Pitching Change: James Pazos replaces Ariel Miranda.
Yuli Gurriel lines out to left fielder Jarrod Dyson.
Brian McCann grounds out, third baseman Kyle Seager to first baseman Danny Valencia.
Jake Marisnick strikes out swinging.
Norichika Aoki reaches on a fielding error by third baseman Kyle Seager.
George Springer flies into a double play, right fielder Mitch Haniger to first baseman Danny Valencia. Norichika Aoki doubled off 1st.
Marwin Gonzalez grounds out, shortstop Jean Segura to first baseman Danny Valencia.
Pitching Change: Dan Altavilla replaces James Pazos.
Jose Altuve strikes out swinging.
Carlos Correa called out on strikes.
Carlos Beltran singles on a ground ball to third baseman Kyle Seager.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-runner Alex Bregman replaces Carlos Beltran.
Yuli Gurriel strikes out swinging.
Taylor Motter remains in the game as the first baseman.
Defensive Substitution: Mike Zunino replaces Guillermo Heredia, batting 7th, playing catcher.
Pitching Change: Edwin Diaz replaces Dan Altavilla.
Brian McCann lines out to left fielder Jarrod Dyson.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Josh Reddick replaces Jake Marisnick.
Josh Reddick strikes out swinging.
Norichika Aoki strikes out swinging.
